content: {"name": "Sacred Heart Church Social Concerns", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Food is available for South Plainfield residents who are in need of assistance.  Driver\u2019s license or \npicture ID with address is necessary for verification of residency.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.churchofthesacredheart.net/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "200 Randolph Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "South Plainfield", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07080", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.5819931, "longitude": -74.4094215}, "phones": [{"number": "(908) 756-0633", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
